column2: "Wow, thanks! You've got everything I needed! Eh? What will I use them for?"
"...mmm, well since you've helped me out, I'll tell you a little bit. I'm going to make a charm and give it to some loser."
"Oh, you're unhappy you're not getting it? I always give you my best present: the lashings of my love!"
"Anyway, thanks, <%me>!! I'll be counting on you!"
